abstract: The oil company BP rejected demands from a group of Russian billionaires to fire the head of the lucrative TNK-BP natural gas venture, deepening a confrontation between shareholders.
snippet: The oil company BP rejected demands from a group of Russian billionaires to fire the head of the lucrative TNK-BP natural gas venture, deepening a confrontation between shareholders.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  BP, the huge British oil company, on Friday rejected demands from a group of Russian billionaires to fire the head of the lucrative TNK-BP natural gas venture, deepening a confrontation between shareholders as the country’s biggest state-controlled oil companies seek a stake in the venture.

headline.main: Rift Develops Among Investors in Russian Gas Venture
headline.print_headline: Investors in Russian Gas Venture Clash
